title: Band Fragment, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wools.
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
Woven
description: Fragment contains two circles, one holds a running lion, the other something that might be a turtle with a flower on its back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band Fragment, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wools.
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
Woven. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-37.
